secText:
Lesson:
1. Explore the movement of air particles in a [OBJ:actsec_n254:sound wave].
2. Describe the structure of a [OBJ:expsec_n256:sound wave].
3. Compare the [OBJ:expsec_n257:frequencies of sounds].
4. Describe how [OBJ:expsec_n258:temperature] affects the speed of sounds.
5. Define [OBJ:pwsec_n259:supersonic speed].
